casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Shaquille ANDREWS Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 28, 2018

Jodi Zils Gagne, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Timothy J. Sugrue, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 179 Conn. App. 903, 176 A.3d 630 (2018), is denied.
